title: 1955년 Communist Party of the United States of America v. Subversive Activities Control Board 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Communist Party of the United States of America v. Subversive Activities Control Board. 판결일: 1955-05-31. 법원: Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit.

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: COMMUNIST PARTY OF THE UNITED STATES of America, Petitioner, v. SUBVERSIVE ACTIVITIES CONTROL BOARD, Respondent
**판결일**: 1955-05-31
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Bazelon, Danaher, Prettyman

## 판결문 요약

223 F.2d 531
    COMMUNIST PARTY OF THE UNITED STATES of America, Petitioner,v.SUBVERSIVE ACTIVITIES CONTROL BOARD, Respondent.
    No. 11850.
    United States Court of Appeals, District of Columbia Circuit.
    Argued October 21, 1954.
    Decided December 23, 1954.
    Petition for Rehearing Denied January 14, 1955.
    Writ of Certiorari Granted May 31, 1955.
    
      See 75 S.Ct. 872.
